reviews.review: It gets repetitive and it's trash.

Amazing game, that is until you get good at it and people think you cheat and you get reported alot; thats when your trust factor goes down and you often get cheaters and smurfs on a regular basis. All I'm saying is, gaben. Take a minute off your Half Life and fix this damn matchmaking/trust factor system. Its bs. <3

is aight but my teammates are shit also everyones a hacker also its cause i dont have a gaming chair 10/10 would recommend

I would definitely recommend this game to others if they're looking to use a third party website like FaceIT or ESEA, since there are no cheaters, and they have faster servers. Other than that, the anti-cheat is kinda bad and you frequently run in to cheaters during matchmaking, which I personally think ruined PUBS the most for me. All in all, I started playing this game a while ago, and have enjoyed the mechanics of it and how the game works.

P.S. The community is very toxic :(
